select i.*,u.name uname,u.mobile,u.userid,a.* from intermediary i LEFT JOIN dingtalk_user u ON i.user_id = u.userid LEFT JOIN area a ON i.area_id = a.id where i.intermediary_id = #{intermediaryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into intermediary (intermediary_name, intermediary_contact, intermediary_contact_tel, area_id, user_id, intermediary_logo_url, intermediary_introduction) values (#{intermediaryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intermediaryContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intermediaryContactTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{user.userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{intermediaryLogoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intermediaryIntroduction,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
